prompt.text:
=Create a professional, eye-catching YouTube thumbnail for a stock analysis video for {{$json.currentStock}} stock. The thumbnail should include:

1. The {{$json.currentStock}} stock ticker prominently displayed
2. The current price: ${{$json.stockPrice}}
3. {{$json.stockRecommendation}} in bold text
4. A professional chart or graph element
5. Use {{$json.priceChangePercent > 0 ? "green" : "red"}} as the primary color theme based on the stock's performance
6. Include a small "Market Mastery Daily" logo or text
7. A clean, professional finance-oriented design suitable for serious investors
8. No clickbait elements or excessive text

The thumbnail should be high-resolution and designed for YouTube's 1280x720 format with clear, legible text even when viewed at smaller sizes.

parameters.bodyContent:
{ "personalizations": [ { "to": [ { "email": "{{$json.userName}}@example.com", "name": "{{$json.userName}}" } ], "subject": "New Video Published: {{$json.videoTitle}}" } ], "from": { "email": "notifications@marketmasterydaily.com", "name": "Market Mastery Daily" }, "content": [ { "type": "text/html", "value": "

YouTube Video Successfully Published

Video Details:

Title: {{$json.videoTitle}}

Content Type: {{$json.contentType.replace("_", " ")}} ({{$json.weekday}} content)

Stock: {{$json.currentStock}} ({{$json.companyName}})

Price: ${{$json.stockPrice}}

Performance: {{parseFloat($json.priceChangePercent) > 0 ? "+" : ""}}{{$json.priceChangePercent}}%

Recommendation: {{$json.stockRecommendation}}

YouTube URL: {{$json.youTubeVideoUrl}}

Channel: Market Mastery Daily (Subscribe)

Promoted Products:

Digital Product: {{$json.digitalProduct.name}} (${{$json.digitalProduct.price}})

Affiliate Product: {{$json.affiliateProduct.name}} ({{$json.affiliateProduct.coupon}})

This email was automatically generated by your workflow on {{$json.timestamp}}

Tracking ID: {{$json.trackingId}}

Channel ID: {{$json.channelId}}

" } ] }

parameters.jsCode:
// Compile all data from the workflow for tracking and analysis
const analyticsData = {
  videoId: $json.youTubeVideoId,
  channelId: $json.channelId,
  videoUrl: $json.youTubeVideoUrl,
  contentType: $json.contentType,
  stock: $json.currentStock,
  recommendation: $json.stockRecommendation,
  stockPrice: parseFloat($json.stockPrice),
  priceChange: parseFloat($json.priceChangePercent),
  supportLevel: parseFloat($json.supportLevel),
  resistanceLevel: parseFloat($json.resistanceLevel),
  rsi: parseFloat($json.rsi),
  thumbnailUrl: $json.thumbnailUrl,
  videoTitle: $json.videoTitle,
  affiliateProduct: $json.affiliateProduct.name,
  digitalProduct: $json.digitalProduct.name,
  publishDate: new Date().toISOString(),
  weekday: $json.weekday,
  distributionChannels: Object.keys($json.socialMediaResponses),
  trackingId: $json.trackingId,
  executionDate: "2025-05-18 06:34:48",
  userName: "onabellaabdullaziz"
};

// Return all data with analytics
return {
  ...$json,
  analyticsData,
  workflowComplete: true,
  nextScheduledRun: new Date(new Date().getTime() + 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString()
};
